text: Ron Smith (6 May 1917 – 19 January 1998) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). His brother Stan also played for Collingwood. == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1917 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Ron Smith (Australian footballer, born 1917)
